p.b: Inkarnate is an online map-making platform that lets you create and manage fantasy maps.

conbody.p: A lot of different people enjoy and trust our app for their map-making needs:

ul.li: fantasy world builders and book authors,
artistic people looking for ways to expand their creative skills,
and many others, young and old!
